vacancytxt:
DevOps Engineer | CREATEQ
About the company:Almost 20 years of experience in distributed software engineering – starting as Switzerland’s pioneer. youngculture, enjoy.ing and NSM Engineering have now landed in the CREATEQ universe.You can discover more information about company on our website: https://createq.space/You will:Be part of our agile team engaged in the development of a global platform for content and eCommerce using the latest enterprise technologies and innovative micro-services architecture, to support the worldwide provision of modern education.You will design and implement an infrastructure on AWS cloud and continuously drive it towards the automation, stability, scalability and security goals. Contribute with your expertise to improve deployment time and manage processes of instances, users, software configuration and testing. Implement automated tools for build, configuration management, continuous integration, deployment and monitoring, according to the highest standards and best practices. Find simple, elegant, powerful and pragmatic solutions to complex problems, while engaging with application development, architecture and infrastructure teams to make informed, collaborative technical decisions.Who we are looking for:- Infrastructure and configuration automation in AWS, specifically with Puppet/Ansible/Packer and Terraform- Networking, load balancing and storage technologies in a cloud environment like AWS EC2 (S3, ELBs, VPCs, SES, Lambda, Route53, RDS, ASGs, CloudFront, etc.)- Monitoring and alerting tools such as Nagios, Zabbix, CloudWatch, and cloud-based site-availability solutions like PagerDuty or Pingdom- Analytic tools like New Relic, Telegraph, InfluxDB- Coding/scripting (Bash, Python, Java, especially SpringBoot and Microservices applications)- Continuous Integrations processes and tools, specifically with Jenkins and its plugins, artifacts built as RPMs for automated deployment, Nexus or Artifactory- Version controls systems such as Git, BitBucket, GitHub and the related concepts of Pull Requests and branching strategies best practices- Previous work with Solr, MongoDB and MySQL, or other similar technologiesOur future colleagues should also have:- Bachelor or higher degree in computer science (or equivalent)- 3+ years of professional experience, with hands-on expertise on deployment and running processes of Java web applications on Unix/Linux environments- Excellent understanding of Configuration Management, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery principles and best practices. Strong quality focus- Open and friendly personality, as well as drive, initiative, problem-solving mindset, excellent interpersonal and team-working skills- Very good verbal and written communication skills in EnglishWhat we offer:- Challenging projects in a highly professional, but also collaborative and supportive environment- Working in small and excellently skilled teams- Opportunity for long-term professional growth within our development center- Competitive compensation depending on experience and skills- Extensive remote work schedule- Respect and support to your professional, family and personal goalsWorking location:- Chișinău, Moldova (Hybrid work)If you think you are suitable for this position, please send your CV to our recruit partner hr@mantis.md and we will contact you as soon as possible!

Mid/Senior Software Developer (2)
Travod is an international fast-growing translation agency based in the UK, that makes information accessible worldwide - we help more than 6000 brands localize their content in more than 120 languages, globally, every day. Prospects and clients we deal with: Amazon, Formlabs, Daimler, Lenovo, Amadeus, Swissport. What will you do? You will work on a SaaS platform that helps international companies from a specific industry to manage their freelancers, projects, clients, and finance. More about the product at the first interview. What we offer you:

Competitive income
We support your growth with performance bonuses and employee appreciation programs.
We are a distributed workforce enabling our employees to find a work mode that is best for them! Working from home is an option as well as working from our office in central Chisinau (for Chisinau-based roles)
Free access to our Library and the opportunity for self-development with our Free Business Udemy courses 
Supportive Learning Financial Package
Fun corporate events and a dedicated contribution to social causes
Grow in a strong culture, that nurtures talent and celebrates results, and supports you throughout your career journey,
We support young families with personalized gifts and vouchers
You have full support from our organizational coach.
You get extra days off: on your birthday, for loyalty, "family reasons"
Referral Bonus

What does a Middle/Senior Developer at Travod do:

Analyze and implement best coding practices into the project code. 
Analyze technical requirements of the project and adapt the code in line with them.
Identify and develop areas for revisions in current projects. 
Execute and implement software tests.
Keep up-to-date with industry trends and technology developments.

What will help you fit into this role:

Preferably experience in Ruby/RoR (middle/senior) or being open to learning it
Experience with Git
Good understanding of how RDBMS systems work
Preferably experience with UX Design patterns
Preferably experience with Vue.js, Bootstrap or other front-end frameworks
A good level of English (English is primary language for communication and documentation)
Analytical thinking and ability to improve requirements quality
Being a hardworking team player 


Send us your CV to career@travod.com stating the position for which you are applying in the subject line – “Mid/Senior Developer”.  Data privacy note: Travod cares about your data privacy. More information about our Data privacy policies is available at www.travod.com/privacy-policy/

Android Developer | OOK Group
OOK Group is a fast-growing company based in Moldova. We specialize in mobile and web applications development, as well as developing strong and scalable back-end systems to support our internal projects. We work together to design and create digital products that we are proud of for the people we believe in.
OOK Group is not just another IT company. We breathe life and live emotions into the projects we work on. Passion and professionalism are the keys to the success of our products, millions of our customers can confirm that.
More details: https://ook.group
We are looking for a software engineer with a strong background in Android development and the ability to build and maintain large-scale, high-performance, and customer-friendly applications.
Required:- 2+ years of experience in Android development- Good knowledge of OOP, Java, Android SDK and XML- Experience with WEB services integration (SOAP/REST)- Good understanding of full mobile development lifecycle- Problem-solving and analytical skills- Communication skills and teamwork- English understanding / writing- Agile development methodology - SCRUM- Jira
Responsibilities:- Maintaining our existing Android applications by adding new features, fixing bugs and improving application performance- New applications development- Writing clean, architecturally sound, high performance and maintainable code- Code reviews and quality control, testing, and refactoring
Is a plus to know:- Kotlin- Unit/Integration/UI testing in Android
The benefits of working with us:- Competitive salary from 1500 up to 4000$- Salary revision each 6 months- Flexible hours (Remote + office)- The use of the latest work technologies- Friendly team- Possibility of professional growth- Table tennis, Xbox- Stability- Regular team-building activities- Office in the city center- Once a year a trip abroad- Birthday bonus
If you think that this opportunity is perfect for you, please send your CV to our recruiting partner hr@mantis.md and they will contact you for an interview as soon as possible.
We thank you for your interest in our career opportunities!

1С Developer 
Requirements

Knowledge of the 1C 8.x platform
Experience in development in the environment 1C 8.x from 2 years
Ability to create a configuration from scratch
Ability to optimize queries in 1C 8.x
1C and SQL server administration skills
Experience in setting up integration between different databases (web/http services, “1C: Data Conversion”)
Basic knowledge of Bitrix 24
1C certificates are welcome
Ability to quickly understand other people's code

Responsibilities

Participation in the project of implementation and development of the existing system: “1C;
Development, testing and configuration of new system functionality;
Support for the current functionality of the system;
Formation of proposals for the development of the system functionality together with the manager;
Preparation of documentation for the implemented functionality

Must-have skills

Maximum attention to detail and analytical thinking
Orientation on research of additional information independently

Benefits of joining Unifun

Unlimited opportunities for fast career growth and professional development
Dynamic and friendly work environment, lack of bureaucracy that make great things be done easier
International team of professionals, open to share their knowledge and best practice with you
Professional trainings, English courses

Salary expectations

Salary level of an international IT company, revision each 6 months
Based on professional experience - any salary level can be discussed

Work conditions

Perfect work place in a new office (A-class) across the Jumbo commercial center
Coffee machine, fruits, snacks, candy as much as you can eat, regular corporate parties
Schedule: Monday-Friday, full time

Additional information

Feel free to send your CV, even if you’re not sure that you meet all job requirements
We analyze and reply to all received CV without any exceptions
If you have any questions - just call 022 885 810

How to apply:Please send us your CV: hr@unifun.com

Senior PHP Developer (Balti)
Responsibilities

Leading role in designing/optimizing/re-engineering of high-load and high-available systems, developed by Unifun for telecom operators
Leading and managing a group of junior developers
Code review and other quality assurance activity
Providing support and improvement for existing projects

Requirements

Advanced proficiency in coding and applying effective techniques
Understanding of software development life cycle
Extensive experience in pure-PHP (both OOP and procedural)
Understanding coding standards and best practices for developing efficient and high-available back-end systems
Advanced proficiency in SQL database development, writing and optimizing SQL statements, keys, relations, indexes, etc.
Deep understanding of MySQL’s underlying storage engines and processes
Experience with Linux console, Git, Nginx/Apache
Skills in team management and project management
Ability to develop project architecture, identify and avoid the risks
Experience in code review and optimization

Must-have skills

Maximum attention to detail and analytical thinking
Orientation on research of additional information independently
Ability to organize workload taking full responsibility for what you do
Ability to provide information clearly and shortly
To be friendly and communicative

Benefits of joining Unifun

Unlimited opportunities for fast career growth and professional development
Dynamic and friendly work environment, lack of bureaucracy that make great things be done easier
International team of professionals, open to share their knowledge and best practice with you
Professional trainings, English courses

Salary expectations

Salary level of an international IT company, revision each 6 months
Based on professional experience - any salary level can be discussed

Work conditions

Perfect work place in a new office (A-class) across the Jumbo commercial center (Chisinau)
Coffee machine, fruits, snacks, candy as much as you can eat, regular corporate parties
Schedule: Monday-Friday, full time

Additional information

Feel free to send your CV, even if you’re not sure that you meet all job requirements
We analyze and reply to all received CV without any exceptions
If you have any questions - just call our career guide Sofia: 022885810

How to apply:Please send us your CV: hr@unifun.com

Senior JAVA Developer
Responsibilities

Leading and managing a group of junior developers
Code review and other quality assurance activity
Providing support and improvement for existing projects

Advanced proficiency in coding and applying effective techniques
Understanding of software development life cycle
Experience in Java coding
Understanding coding standards and best practices for developing efficient and high-available back-end systems
Advanced proficiency in SQL database development, writing and optimizing SQL statements, keys, relations, indexes, etc.
Deep understanding of MySQL’s underlying storage engines and processes
Experience with Linux console, Git, Nginx/Apache, Tomcat
Skills in team management and project management
Ability to develop project architecture, identify and avoid the risks
Experience in code review and optimization

Maximum attention to detail and analytical thinking
Orientation on research of additional information independently
Ability to organize workload taking full responsibility for what you do
Ability to provide information clearly and shortly
To be friendly and communicative

Dynamic and friendly work environment, lack of bureaucracy that make great things be done easier

Feel free to send your CV, even if you’re not sure that you meet all job requirements
We analyze and reply to all received CV without any exceptions

Android Developer
What would You doAs a senior Android developer, you will be working with an international team and be responsible for the POS terminal application development.

Develop, build, maintain and improve Android applications
Test devices and emulators
Deliver a clean, high quality, well-documented code
Evaluate emerging technologies to improve an existing application
Collaborate with Product owners, Developers and QA engineers to build large scale fintech products: card issuing and acquiring processing platform, payment gateway, digital wallet provider
Be a valuable team player by sharing knowledge and best practices with the team

What we expect from You

Extensive experience with JAVA and Kotlin
Have experience with reactive programming (RxJava or RxAndroid)
Good architectural understanding of MVP and MVVM
Good understanding of Android`s design patterns and SOLID principles
Bonus points if you have experience with GIT, Retrofit, Dagger, Room, Gson, Unit testing
Focus on quality and critical thinking
Fluent communication in English

We offer

High performing, ambitious, collaborative and fun working culture
Fast pace learning environment and opportunities to grow professionally in a vibrant international environment
Long term continuous project work with internal clients
Flexible relation to the company and freedom of thinking
Young, positive, innovative team; friendly and skilled colleagues
Office in the heart of Chisinau city with provided parking
Company paid lunches, professional trainings, fresh fruits and drinks in the office, workation, hybrid work oportunity, great team building events, and much more

Business Intelligence Analyst (English)
We are looking for a Business Intelligence Analyst to join our team! 
Your main goal will be to support and ensure the successful completion of analytical, building, testing, and deployment tasks that drive insights into our operations. 
Our Business Intelligence department is waiting for You with open arms.Your Responsibilities:

Transforming datasets into meaningful and actionable insights 
Building  and maintaining dashboards using Power BI
Taking a proactive role in supporting essential business functions with actionable insights 
Managing daily operations and development of Picanova analytics and reporting tools
Participating in various cross-department projects with a focus on analyzing business requirements and providing solutions 
Performing internal research projects

We expect from You:

A University degree in Economics, Statistics, Business Administration or IT would be an advantage.
Strong knowledge of Power BI and DAX language
Perfect SQL knowledge
Excellent Excel and Power Pivot skills
Analytical thinking, solution-oriented and flexible personality with experience in communication with the management of different levels
Fluent knowledge of English - written and spoken

We offer:

Attractive salary depending on the seniority
Working experience in an international team
Comfortable and modern office in the city center
Private Health insurance
Meal allowance (100 Euros per month)
Comfortable schedule, both earlier and later hours: 9:00 - 18:00 or 10:00 - 19:00 (Monday - Friday)
In-house/Hybrid/Remote Possibility 
Valuable knowledge and excellent experience for future development
Possibilities for self-development (training, coaching, conferences)
Attractive referral bonus
Team building and company events that will break up the work monotony

Have we sparked your interest?Send us your CV in English at this email: hr-chisinau@picanova.com.

Middle iOS Developer
About RoslinRoslin is a technology-enabled business services company. We specialize in improving business performance for some of America’s largest ground transportation providers. Every day our team delivers a next-generation customer experience and helps transportation companies better connect with their customers.We develop turnkey systems that feature real-time dispatching, vehicle location, and tracking, as well as computerized routing and scheduling, integrated billing, and cashiering. An innovator in data dispatching, we provide market-specific application software, mobile, and portable device interfaces, and infrastructure products.Project description:Currently, we are building an intelligent fleet management platform for dispatch, billing, and cashiering that seamlessly connects multiple transportation fleets with clients via one system. We offer both an intuitive, intelligent technology and a strong partnership for transportation providers, delivering savings, simplicity, and accounting transparency.The platform includes multiple different services, mobile, and web applications.Required Skills:- Swift- XCTest- CocoaPods- Cocoa Touch- Fastlane- MVVM- MVC- Objective-C- RxSwift- UIKit- TestFlight- UI TestResponsibilities:- Participation in the estimation and planning of development tasks- Designing and implementing new features, extend existing.- Code review and knowledge sharing- Write robust and efficient code primarily using Swift 5, but also Objective-C when needed.- Communication with project stakeholders, including the product management team.- Maintain good coverage of code base with unit and integration tests- Reporting to Mobile Development team leaderWhy joining us is a good idea:1. Competitive salaries. There are no such cookies in the world that can make up for a good paycheck :), and we offer competitive salaries according to the level of your skills.2. Interesting projects. Our apps will be global and available in different markets. We complement the salary with an opportunity to really contribute to something big.3. Founders will work hand to hand with developers.4. Every employee in the company has a voice, and discussions are routine.5. Long-term employmentInterested?Email your CV to lilia@roslin.us
In the subject line, please specify the following: Middle iOS Developer

Middle Java Developer (IT Solutions for Financial Sector)
For more than 15 years, we have been offering our customers innovative technologies and a wide range of information technology solutions and services. Our main goal is to provide high-performance technology solutions oriented to our customers' needs.
We build partnerships with recognized companies in IT solutions and services for the financial sector, using products provided by the most famous manufacturers in the field. Currently, we are focused on expanding the portfolio with specific solutions for the financial industry and other areas of activity where demand for new solutions has increased.
We're looking for a Middle Java Developer with confident experience in Java/J2EE technologies. You will be trained in Romania in the first weeks to get the necessary knowledge.
With us, you will:- assist the business analyst with the translation of business requirements into technical ones- design and develop software components using various APIs- satisfy NFR-s, with particular emphasis on security, scalability, and performance- be involved in all phases of software development and ensure their execution following technical and business specifications- write technical documentation for software components- offer support for the software solution
You’re the best candidate if:- you have at least 3+ years of experience in a similar role- you have a solid understanding of object-oriented programming and design patterns- you have a bachelor’s degree in computer science or computer engineer- you have excellent Russian, Romanian, and English skills- you have an analytical mind with problem-solving solid aptitudes- you have excellent teamwork skills
Our ideal candidate should possess the following technology stack:- Java- EJB3- JPA (Hibernate)- Spring (core, security, mvc)- JSP- Java Script- REST- Data Basa (SqlServer, Oracle, PostgreSQL)- JBoss/Wildfly- Git- JUnit
It would be nice to have:- experience with jBMP, Apache Zookeeper, Apache Solr- interaction with Dojo framework
We’re ready to offer you the following:- a high official salary- working hours: 09.00 - 17.00 (5 days/week)- professional training and continuous career growth opportunities- young, friendly, and supportive team- modern office with all the facilities
If you want to work with a passionate and dedicated team, send your CV in English to valeria@bestpeople.md. It is confidential.

C# Developer (10 000 - 45 000 mdl)
Команда Midnight Works ищет разработчиков C# с разным уровнем навыков
Вы идеально подходите если есть:- Опыт в разработке;- Знание C #;- NET Core;- Git;- OOP & Design patterns;- Rest API.
Будет плюсом знание и понимание:- Unity- MySQL;- Docker;- MongoDB;- Redis.
Мы предлагаем:- Привлекательную заработную плату в зависимости от ваших навыков и знаний;- Официальное трудоустройство, социальный пакет;- Полный курс английского языка;- Абонемент в тренажерный зал;- Ежемесячная Pizza party в кругу компании;- Подземная парковка;- График работы понедельник-пятница, 9.00-18.00;- Профессиональное обучение и постоянную поддержку;- Офис в секторе Телецентр, удачно расположенный район с остановками общественного транспорта и местами для обеда поблизости;- Удобное место работы с зоной отдыха, чаем/кофе, сладостями и фруктами.
Чтобы стать частью команды Midnight.Works, отправьте свое резюме по адресу: hr@midnight.works или позвоните по номеру: +373 69 666 650.

Unity Developer (10 000 - 45 000 mdl)
Echipa Midnight.Works își lărgește echipa de profesioniști!
Responsabilități principale:- Crearea de prototipuri de jocuri 3D de la zero- Programarea logicii de joc, a interfeței de utilizare și multe altele- Optimizarea performanțelor pentru dispozitive mobile- Integrare SDK de la terți (Facebook, GA, AdMob etc.)- Construirea  proiectelor pentru iOS și Android
Cerințe:- Experiență în Unity- Experiență în dezvoltarea de jocuri 3D pentru mobil pe Unity- Experiență în optimizarea jocurilor mobile pe Unity- Codul clar și experiența în GitHub- Dorința de a învăța noi tehnici și instrumente- Independent și responsabil
Beneficii:- Posibilitatea de a fi parte a unei companii cunoscute la nivel internațional- Suntem rezidenți IT Park- Curs deplin de limbă engleză- Abonament sala de sport- Pizza party lunar in incinta companiei- Parcare subterana (50% achitat de companie)- Salariul flexibil, stabilit de comun acord în dependență de aptitudinile Dvs.- Angajare oficială, pachet social inclus- Program de muncă stabil: 9:00-18:00, luni-vineri- Colectiv tânăr, amabil și sociabil- Activități de Team-building - Oficiu în sectorul Telecentru o zonă bine amplasată cu transport public și localuri pentru lunch în apropiere- Birou confortabil, cu zonă de relaxare și ceai/cafea, dulciuri și fructe gratuite
Sunteți interesați de postul vacant? Puteți trimite CV-ul dumneavoastră lala adresa hr@midnight.worksWeb: https://midnight.works/Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/midnight_works/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/www.midnight.works/
Основные Обязанности:- Создание 3D игровых прототипов с нуля- Программирование игровой логики, UI и остального- Оптимизация производительности для мобильных устройств- Интеграция сторонних SDK (Facebook, GA, AdMob etc)- Сборка проектов под iOS и Android
Требования:- Опыт работы с Unity- Опыт разрабатывания 3D мобильных игр на Unity- Опыт оптимизации мобильных игр на Unity- Порядок в коде и в репозитории- Готовность осваивать новые техники и инструменты- Самостоятельность и ответственность
Мы предлагаем:- Официальное трудоустройство- Полный соц. пакет- Курс Английского языка - Абонемент в спортзал- Ежемесячные pizza party в кругу компаний - Подземный паркинг (50% оплата со стороны компании)- Достойный уровень заработной платы- График работы с 09:00 до 18:00 (пн-пт)- Pаботу в молодой, целеустремленной и энергичной команде
Заинтересовала вакансия? Вы можете прислать свое резюме на адрес hr@midnight.worksWeb: https://midnight.works/Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/midnight_works/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/www.midnight.works/

iOS Developer Middle (20000 - 45000 mdl)
Midnight.Works is looking for ambitious software engineers with a strong background in iOS development. If you possess drive, initiative and good team player, then we are waiting for you with the arms-wide-open!
Technical Requirements:- Experience with UIKit, Combine and Foundation Libraries;- Experience with MVVM, MVI, View Models, Reactive Programming, and other architectures;- Understanding of mobile development lifecycle;- Experience with WEB services integration (SOAP/REST);- Experience with In-App Purchase- Good knowledge of OOP, Objective C, Swift;- Basic Git Knowledge;- Maintain High-Quality Code & Good Organizational Skills.
Responsibilities:- Build, ship and maintain mobile apps on the iOS platform;- Work with the team to design new product features;- Proactively address performance issues and bugs.
Benefits:- Flexible salary, determined by mutual agreement depending on your skills;- Full English language course;- Subscription to the gym;- Monthly pizza party at the company headquarters;- Team-building activities;- Underground parking lot;- Full Social Package, Medical Assurance;- Stable working hours: 9:00-18:00, Monday-Friday;- Office in the Telecentru sector, a well-located area with public transport and places to eat nearby;- Comfortable desk with seating area and tea/coffee, sweets and fruit.Use the email below to send us your resume and let us know you’re interested in the job!

Network Engineer 1000-1500 USD | Motava
About the company:Motava is an IT consulting company, which was founded in 2009 in San Jose, California (but already in 2020 the headquarters moved to San Francisco, California). Company’s digital marketing and design/development teams work from our on-shore office and off-shore locations in Croatia, Ukraine and Moldova.
You can discover more information about the company on our website: https://www.motava.com/
Requirements:- Experience with network administration of at least 1-2 years- Experience with network equipment (routers, switches, firewalls)- Experience with Network protocols & redundancy, TCP/IP, Wi-Fi, switch stacking data/power, routers/firewalls HA mode, VRRP, VTP, STP, S2S VPN, RA VPN, EtherChannel- Experience with network equipment configuration/troubleshooting (mostly Cisco/MikroTik)- Firewall management, maintenance, and configuration (Palo Alto/Cisco ASA)- Experience with monitoring systems (Paessler PRTG)- Substantial Personal Responsibility and Autonomy- Communication skills and ability to present complex technical information to both technical and non-technical staff- Good knowledge of English
Responsibilities:- Maintaining, monitoring, configuring, and troubleshooting network/server equipment- Customer support/helpdesk - Office365, RDP/VPN, customer job-related inquiries- Keep track of incoming issues from customers by tracking the ticketing system, email and/or phone. Ensure response in a timely manner according to company SLAs- Writing and updating IT system documentation- Performing system backups, recovery procedures, and disaster recovery plans- Project-oriented tasks - planning/design, equipment and software acquisition, configuration, and deployment- Ability to learn new stuff by researching specific technology on your own
We offer:- Competitive salary (1000-1500$)- Salary reviews every 12 months based on living/inflation + personal performance- Performance bonus programs based on achieved goals- Company provides all the necessary work equipment and internet access- Company offers Training and Development opportunities- The possibility to work full remote (18:00-03:00)
If you think you are suitable for this position, please send your CV to our recruit partner hr@mantis.md and we will contact you as soon as possible!
We thank you for your interest in our career opportunities!

Full Stack PHP Developer | NUACOM
NUACOM is an Irish company established in 2009 and quickly became the leading Unified Communication provider in Ireland. The vision of the company is to leverage the latest technologies to build amazing live communication tools for businesses around the world. 
We offer cloud-based phone system as a service, online contact centre software and online team collaboration software to small and medium businesses.We are looking to recruit an experienced web developer to join our existing team. We have a lot of new project ideas as well as some ideas on the improvement of the existing ones.https://nuacom.ie/ 

Skills and experience required for this position:- 5+ years of work experience- Front-end skills: JavaScript, AngularJS/ReactJS, CSS, HTML5- Back-end: PHP (MVC and OOP), NodeJS- DB: MySQL or PostgreSQL- Cloud Environment: AWS- Experience in Agile development methodology and knowledge of project management tools like Jira- Git-based version control- RESTful API and WebSocket- Knowledge of the CI/CD tools and processes- QA Skills: Testing automation, Unit testing with PHPUnit- (Bonus) Experience with WebRTC, ElectronJS, Node-Webkit, ReactNative- Good eye for UI/UX and graphic skills will be considered an advantage
You will be:- Developing new applications for our cloud Unified Communications platform using API centric web technologies- Maintain the existing codebase- Work with marketing and support team and improve the business processes automation
We offer:- Competitive salary with annual salary reviews- Great working environment- Career growth opportunity- Flexible remote working- Relocation package and visa sponsorship for good candidates willing to relocate- Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Our recruitment partner is mantis.md, so you are invited to send your CV to hr@mantis.md

They will organize an interview with us. You are welcome to our team!

Lead Generator (limbile germană, italiană, engleză)

Completăm echipa noastră cu noi colegi care vorbesc limbile germană, italiană, engleză pentru a lucra pe piața EU.
Oferim:

salariu 400 euro + bonusuri
oficiu în centrul Chișinăului
contract de muncă oficial
program de lucru - 8 ore este posibil si 6 ore/zi
Luni-Vineri 09.00-18.00
prânzuri din contul companiei

Responsabilități:

Abilităţi excelente de comunicare, negociere şi persuasiune;
Responsabil, organizat şi orientat spre rezultate înalte.

Cerințe:

cunoașterea limbii germană, italiană, engleză la nivel avansat
comunicare și perseverență

Restul te vom învăța noi! Ești interesat?Expediază-ne CV-ul la mailul cv-rb@grafit.md

Office Manager
Responsibilities:

Receiving, noting and forwarding telephone calls.
Providing customers/potential customers with information about the company's products
Preparing and editing documents in requested situations
Providing support to company employees (e.g. data entry activities, appointment scheduling, xerox/scanning, emails, etc.)
Managing, recording and distributing incoming/outgoing correspondence
Supplying the office with stationery and other necessary supplies
Serving guests as needed (water, tea, coffee)

Candidate requirements:

Responsible person, dynamic, punctual, communicable

Feel free to apply your CV even if you are not sure if this job is right for you =)Interested persons can send their CV to the following e-mail address: munca@unifun.com with the mention of the position they are applying for. Good luck! For further information call 022885810

English-speaking Travel Agent
Dyninno is a group of companies founded in 2004 in San Francisco. It provides products and services in the finance, travel, and entertainment sectors in 50 markets. 3,500 professionals work in the company around the world. Its offices are located in the USA, UK, Latvia, Canada, India, the Philippines, Moldova, Egypt, Colombia, Italy, Romania, Uzbekistan, Brazil, Turkey, Vietnam, Nigeria.
Dyninno Travel focuses on agency sales of air tickets and travel services to both retail and corporate clients. It manages the brands ASAP Tickets, International Travel Network, Innovative Travel Solutions (ITS), as well as a number of online services.
You can learn more about us here www.dyninno.com
We are looking for English-speaking Travel Agents!
As a Travel Agent, you have a passion for the travel industry, enjoy building connections with people, and are a natural problem-solver.At ITS we are looking for people who love helping others, are persistent, empathetic, kind, and curious.
Benefits

Official employment.
Average GROSS $1500 (base salary $500 + unlimited bonus)
Engagement with a global travel organization with 20 years of experience on the market.
Hands-on experience with industry-defining innovative trends.
Extensive Promos & Bonuses program.
Guaranteed development.
Team-building events.
Participation in global-scale projects.

In this role, you will:

Receive and process requests from customers interested in purchasing airline
tickets and tour packages.
Helps customers choose the best option.
Use one of the most advanced booking and sales engines for airline tickets and tours.
Build trust and long-term cooperation with Customers.
Participate in training and continuous development.
Attend 2 weeks of free initial professional orientation.
Receive 24/7 support from world-class Trainers and Advisors.

Ideal Candidate:

Speaks English at an advanced level.
Is flexible with hours of availability.
Is results and growth-oriented.
Is empathetic and ambitious.
Is stress-resistant.
